content:
/>
XIII.ii.3.A.1.f
.
What the Certificate for Preference for Public Housing Must Contain
The certificate for preference for public housing must contain the
name of the Veteran
VA claims folder number, and
date of preparation.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Certificate of Preference for Public Housing
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
